00109 typedef enum rpmQueryFlags_e {
00110     QUERY_FOR_DEFAULT   = 0,            
00111     QUERY_MD5           = (1 << 0),     
00112     QUERY_SIZE          = (1 << 1),     
00113     QUERY_LINKTO        = (1 << 2),     
00114     QUERY_USER          = (1 << 3),     
00115     QUERY_GROUP         = (1 << 4),     
00116     QUERY_MTIME         = (1 << 5),     
00117     QUERY_MODE          = (1 << 6),     
00118     QUERY_RDEV          = (1 << 7),     
00119         /* bits 8-14 unused, reserved for rpmVerifyAttrs */
00120     QUERY_CONTEXTS      = (1 << 15),    
00121     QUERY_FILES         = (1 << 16),    
00122     QUERY_DEPS          = (1 << 17),    
00123     QUERY_SCRIPT        = (1 << 18),    
00124     QUERY_DIGEST        = (1 << 19),    
00125     QUERY_SIGNATURE     = (1 << 20),    
00126     QUERY_PATCHES       = (1 << 21),    
00127     QUERY_HDRCHK        = (1 << 22),    
00128     QUERY_FOR_LIST      = (1 << 23),    
00129     QUERY_FOR_STATE     = (1 << 24),    
00130     QUERY_FOR_DOCS      = (1 << 25),    
00131     QUERY_FOR_CONFIG    = (1 << 26),    
00132     QUERY_FOR_DUMPFILES = (1 << 27)     
00133 } rpmQueryFlags;

00135 #define _QUERY_FOR_BITS \
00136    (QUERY_FOR_LIST|QUERY_FOR_STATE|QUERY_FOR_DOCS|QUERY_FOR_CONFIG|\
00137     QUERY_FOR_DUMPFILES)
